title: Sympathetic nervous system slowing of digestion

content.question: Tamaraâ€™s coach reminds the team not to eat for several hours before the basketball game because the digestive process will be slowed down due to the intense activity. Which of the following aspects of the peripheral nervous system is directly responsible for slowing down digestive processes during the game?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
